column2: Seeking to become stronger as a duelist, you dedicate yourself to training for days and nights.
Seek to become a better duelist
The faith of the Old Gods prays to nameless deities of stone and earth and tree through their weirwoods.
Understands combat, but fails to execute properly
A fine sword, but not much more
Attracts some renown, though not much beyond the common men
A master at arms, amazes all with their prowess and knowledge of combat
The sword of their lifetime, few would be able to best them in combat.
